(.*) Grotto$: Hope you brought your water boots - $1 Grotto doesn' clean itself.
Grotto life chose you. Welcome to $1.
$1 Grotto discovered. Smells like wet troll and regret.
(.*) Cave$: You discovered $1 Cave. It' probably filled with totally friendly people!
$1 Cave? Classic place to catch a cold and maybe a bandit axe to the face.
Echoes of your bad decisions await in $1 Cave.
(.*) Barrow$: Welcome to $1 Barrow. Please keep hands and feet away from the Draugr.
$1 Barrow unlocked! Time to disturb ancient resting places. Again.
You found $1 Barrow. Did you bring your anti-undead spray?
(.*) Crypt$: A fine place to take your final nap: $1 Crypt.
$1 Crypt - because nothing says adventure like being neck-deep in corpses.
(.*) Farm$: You discovered $1 Farm. Smells like honest labor and slightly less honest manure.
$1 Farm: Skyrim' #1 location for cabbage-based adventures.
No dragons, just turnips. Welcome to $1 Farm.
(.*) Camp$: Another camp! $1 Camp might even have... tents!
You found $1 Camp. Don' step on any bear traps.
$1 Camp: Because Skyrim didn' have enough rocks and bad weather already.
(.*) Mine$: Welcome to $1 Mine. Hope you like swinging pickaxes and existential dread.
You discovered $1 Mine. Ore today, gone tomorrow.
$1 Mine: Not OSHA-approved, but full of character (and probably spiders).
(.*) Tower$: You discovered $1 Tower. Time to climb something unnecessarily tall!
What's in $1 Tower? Definitely not a romantic view and a picnic.
$1 Tower: Because being grounded is for Nords with no ambition.
(.*) Watchtower$: Another scenic $1 Watchtower. Trolls and arrows, guaranteed.
$1 Watchtower: Perfect for spotting dragons, or getting spotted by them.
You found $1 Watchtower. No one' watching, though. They're all dead.
(.*) Ruins$: You discovered $1 Ruins. Bet it' full of perfectly safe architecture.

Another ruin, another day of looting cultural heritage. Thanks $1!

Discovered $1 Shack. Now with 50% more tragic backstory!
(.*) Redoubt$: $1 Redoubt discovered. Forsworn probably not thrilled you're here.
$1 Redoubt: Come for the scenery, stay for the ambushes.
Discovered $1 Redoubt. Rated 3/5 stars on BanditAdvisor.
(.*) Stone$: $1 Stone! Time to pick a zodiac sign and pretend it matters.

$1 Stone discovered. Empower yourself... or get mildly buffed.
(.*) Mill$: $1 Mill discovered. Smells like flour, woodchips, and childhood trauma.

You discovered $1 Mill. I bet it'... rotating slowly.
